key_risks: Significant financial pressures from Long-Term Care Insurance (LTCI) business due to rising claims costs and low interest rates

controversies: Regulatory scrutiny over rate increases and claims management practices

social_issues: Customer trust issues due to premium increases and policy cancellations
governance_issues: Compliance with evolving state and federal insurance regulations
Challenges in maintaining trust and compliance despite emphasis on integrity and compliance in Code of Ethics
